input.description: String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module. Example: BMC_AR_System

change timing [Optional]
Change timing, if any, recieved from Bladelogic.

change type [Optional]
Change type, if any, recieved from Bladelogic.

urgency [Optional]
Change urgency, if any, recieved from Bladelogic.

impact [Optional]
Change impact, if any, recieved from Bladelogic.

risk level [Optional]
Change risk level, if any, recieved from Bladelogic.

comments
Comments contain description for the Change Summary field. This input should be less than 100 characters. Extra characters shall be truncated.
Default Value: Operator Initiated Change

output.description: XML document that maps the normalized concept update value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept urgency value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)

output.to: bl to ITSM risk level mapping
output.from: bl to ITSM risk level mapping

output.to: bl to ITSM change type mappings
output.from: bl to ITSM change type mappings

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${change type}')>0">${change type}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//$[configuration name]/Change_Management/*[local-name()='Default_Change_Type']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${risk level}')>0">${risk level}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//$[configuration name]/Change_Management/*[local-name()='Default_Risk_Level']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${change timing}')>0">${change timing}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//$[configuration name]/Change_Management/*[local-name()='Default_Timing']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:variable name="summary"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length("$[comments]")>0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(concat(//$[configuration name]/Change_Management/*[local-name()='Default_Change_Summary']/text(), ","), '${comments}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//$[configuration name]/Change_Management/*[local-name()='Default_Change_Summary']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="substring($summary, 1, 99)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.to: bl to ITSM risk level mapping
bl to ITSM change type mappings

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${impact}') > 0">${impact}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//$[configuration name]/BMC_Remedyforce/*[local-name()='Default_Impact']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${urgency}') > 0">${urgency}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//$[configuration name]/BMC_Remedyforce/*[local-name()='Default_Urgency']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.to: bsa timing to remedyforce type mappings

input.from: bsa timing to remedyforce type mappings

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//mapping[@name='${change type}']/text()) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="//mapping[@name='${change type}']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change type}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.from: bsa timing to remedyforce type mappings

documentation.description: This workflow will extract the configuration data for a given configuration name.
